cpymake
=========

cpymake is a setuptools plugin that simplifies building python C extensions
using CMake




.. |Doc Status| image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/cemake/badge/?version=latest
  :target: https://cemake.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
  :alt: Documentation Status
